email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR for a freight quote of USD 25 per MT. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan dates are 20-25 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thanks for the offer. USD 25 per MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the demurrage rate and any possible discounts?

Looking forward to your response.
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
John,

The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thanks for the revised offer. We can accept USD 23 per MT. Please confirm the laycan dates and send the recap.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
John,

Confirmed. Laycan dates are 20-25 October. I will send the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Emily Smith
